Hoho.. you have come for help!

The application is pretty simple!!!

 Adding a new deadline:
 To add a deadline, you need to click the Add Button near below the device's screen. A dialog will appear and will ask you about the deadline's title, you can also add a short description to it.
 Set the time and date by pressing the time and date texts at the dialog.
 By pressing the 'Okay' button, an alarm will be set according to your provided time

 Editing a deadline:
 To edit a deadline, simply click the deadline item in the list and a dialog will ask for confirmation.
 You can update the title, description, date and time of the deadline you wish to.

 Deleting a deadline:
 If you wish to delete a deadline, simply long press the item you wish to and a dialog will ask for confirmation.
 The alarm you've set will also be deleted.

 Deleting all Deadlines:
 If you wish to delete all the deadlines you've created, simply click the Menu button on the upper right of the screen, and click 'Delete All'.
 However, a warning, this method will not delete all the alarms you've set (a feature to be updated), so it is better to individually delete each deadline you wish to.

 Viewing your profile:
 You can view your profile details through the Account Information in the Navigation Menu.
 Additionally, you can see the current number of deadlines you have to accomplish!

 Editing your account:
 You can edit your profile details through the Account Settings in the Navigation Menu.
 However, you can not edit your username and password.

 This app is hoped to be more furnished and updated. 

Keep programming!
Time\'s Up is a deadline manager application developed for students who wish to keep track of the deadlines they must accomplish. A submission as the final project for CS0011 - Mobile Programming.
This is hoped to have more future changes and updates.
